title: Sync Loop When Using Nethermind on Kintsugi
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description Prysm beacon-chain goes into a loop at block batch starting from 0x1b0d81e1... 704/52782 when syncing from nethermind. ## üî• Error 

[2021-12-23 16:04:42]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 58 starting from  0x1b0d81e1... 704/52798 - estimated time remaining 33m15s blocksPerSecond=26.1 peers=38

## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
  
Linux Mint 20.2
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
  
51ef502b04b286fe920aeaf06aa49c53ffabd754
Seeing exact same sync loop (block 704->640) with Prysm (docker `kintsugi-9475bc`) and Nethermind (docker `kintsugi_0.5` ). cc: @MarekM25
followed up with @SeaMonkey82 , we can close for now and reopen as needed.
